title: A Door in the River
description: Stinging deaths aren't uncommon in the summertime, but when Henry Wiest turns up stung to death at an Indian reservation, Detective Hazel Micallef senses not all is as it seems. And when it turns out the "bee" was a diabolical teenaged girl on a murder spree with a strange weapon, a dark and twisted crime begins to slowly emerge. The questions, contradictions, and bodies begin to mount, as two separate police forces struggle to work together to save the soul of Westmuir County. The third thrilling installment in this acclaimed mystery series, A Door in the River is a brilliantly plotted, psychologically complex, and spellbinding storyâ€•and the most haunting Hazel Micallef novel yet.
author: Inger Ash Wolfe
